# thedns-sdk-python



### Proposal

The module is to register your device with public names.

### Example Code

```text
>>> 
>>> import thedns
>>> ddns = thedns.DDNS()
>>> ddns.update()
{'9fa4b54b7013e04640fc064396617e1f.public.thedns.cn': '81.71.103.82', '9fa4b54b7013e04640fc064396617e1f.private.thedns.cn': '10.103.0.12'}
>>> 


```
